article: I'm surprised how good these things are. To eat. Starting from the head, working my way down, ahahaha…

comments.comment: Assessment: Manjuu are inedible. Photograph depicts a stylized confectionery, likely a bun.
Hang on, you can EAT those?!
I've come up with a new recipe: Commander buns. If anyone wants to make some later, do let me know.
Commander buns? I'm all in… Give me the ingredients and I'll have 500 ready by tomorrow~
No, we're not baking! Stop messing around!
Would you like one, my dear Commander? Open your mouth and I'll feed you~
Would you like one, my dear Commander? Open your mouth and I'll feed you~
